Classification: Scripted
Genre: Crime | Drama
Status: Returning Series
Network: BBC One ( United Kingdom)
Airs: Mondays at 09:00 pm
Runtime: 60 Minutes
Premiere: November 15, 2010
Episode Order: 4

Accused is a drama series broadcast on BBC One in the United Kingdom. Each episode features an everyday person who has ended up in the dock accused of different crimes.
